amendment.description: To provide continuing appropriations in fiscal year 2011 and additional appropriations for disaster relief in fiscal years 2011 and 2012.

action.text: Motion to table the motion to concur in the House amendment to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 2608) with an amendment (SA 655) agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 36. Record Vote Number: 151.

Amendment SA 655 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S5922) To provide continuing appropriations in fiscal year 2011 and additional appropriations for disaster relief in fiscal years 2011 and 2012.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 655 proposed by Senator Reid.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table the motion to concur in the House amendment to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 2608) with an amendment (SA 655) agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 36. Record Vote Number: 151.
